newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korea's Kim orders 12 pct rise in defence budget.
newsitem.headline: S.Korea's Kim orders 12 pct rise in defence budget.

text.p: South Korea President Kim Young-sam on Wednesday ordered a 12 percent increase in the state defence budget in 1997 from a 10.7 percent rise this year.

A presidential statement said President Kim stressed the importance of modernising the nation's defence power and encouraging the South Korean military force due to the uncertainity surrounding the Korean peninsula.
A finance and economy ministry official said the defense budget would total 14.26 trillion won next year from a projected 12.74 trillion won this year.
South Korea's largest single budgetary component would remain defence, which takes more than 20 percent of all expenditures.
